answers.answer: My doctor didnt tell me what size they think the baby will be but I know he is in the 45%... He is head down.. and I have gained.. 18 pounds.. I lost a pound at my last appointment. But I found out the reason they are doing my growth follow up ultrasounds is to make sure that he doesn't get too big for me to deliver (because I am so small) so that was nice to learn lol

As of 2 weeks ago Mollie was head up but hopefully she will work her way down.  So far I have gaind 29-30lbs, depending on which day and if I am retaining fluid.  The doc said if she is not head down in the next few weeks then that means c-section.  I am crossing my fingers......I DO NOT WANT A C-SECTION!!!!

whitlack Ill cross my fingers for you too.. I dont want a c-section either.. but Im afraid that if my hips dont spread enough I will have to have one.. I was a size 00-0 before getting preg and am now a lousy size 1.. Idk how im gonna push a baby out of my skinny hips :/ Im scared.

Hi Ladies, my ob hasn't yet told me what she thinks my bub will weigh when he is born but right now he is weighing about 2 kilos (4.4 pounds).He is head down, has been for a few weeks so I think he is staying that way.I don't know about you ladies but right now at this point in my pregnancy I am feeling the wirst stretching pains in my stomach (like lots of little stitches).I guess its because its getting to be a tight squeeze these days so you feel it more or something. Anyone else feel this way?I have put on 10 kilos (22 pounds) which is ok I suppose.I can't wait til we all have our babies!I hope everyone is doing great and just keep on keeping on! Not long to go now x
WORST*I hate making spelling mistakes and not realising til its posted!

As of last Monday my babies were 3.4 and 3.5lb.  I will continue to go for those special sonograms every 2 weeks to see how they are progressing.  So far bottom baby is head down, but the top one is lying across my belly, which is making things uncomfortable for me :).  Most probably it's a c section for me, but with twins I think it's safer, so I don't mined.My weight gain stoped at around week 24, after I gained 14lb.  Doc doesn't seem to be concerned as long as babies are doing fine.  But looks like over this weekend I've put on another 1.5lbs, so maybe I'll gain a bit more.

I have my 34week ultrasound and appt today. Last  check 2 weeks ago Elijah was almost 4lbs and head down. I am starting to get scared, I actually sat by my four year old stepsons bed and cried last night... all because we were talking about his first day of preschool and He said he wasn't scared, was I ever scared of anything? I realized I am scared to death of giving birth. Spent thurs and fri in the hospital and almost didn't have time for fear they were gonna deliver me because of possible preeclampsia... but luckily i got to come home with my bunni still in the oven. I have had so many changes and so much stress I have not been able to take any birthing classes or anything... I feel woefully unprepared and it's like looking down a dark tunnel where you know there will be a ray of light at the end, but no idea what you will encounter along the way.....

My doctor hasn't said how big he thinks Olivia will be at birth, but he has said that she is head down. I have a 4D ultrasound scheduled for Friday and I am hopeing that they will tell be how big she is right now. I have had my other children at 36 weeks and both of them were actually big for 36 weeks. My first child was 5lbs 8 oz and my second child was 6lbs 12oz and rumor has it that the more children you have the bigger they get, so I am a little worried that Olivia is going to be really big. I have already gained about 23lbs with this pregnancy and with the other two I had only gained 20lbs at teh time I gave birth. So I am already bigger than I have ever been. I am just so ready for her to get here. I just want to hold her in my arms. But I just have a few more weeks to go.

No comment from doctor but at todays appointment I'm now measuring 34 weeks and I'll be 30 weeks tomorrow.  OUch....my sugar test came back normal, so he is checking my thyroid again but it was in normal range 4-6 weeks ago.scared to have a big baby... first was 6p11oz, second was 7p3oz both boys, now my girl who knows but I can't have a 9 pounder, I've seen them born that size and they are HUGE!Maybe a c-section is in my future because dates are right. The last 2 or 3 visits have be 2 weeks again but now 4....Can I still have a small baby?  how accurate is this thing? I know I am all belly this time where the others I was more the shape of the world... very very round

well, neither of my dr's have told me how big alex is....my mom had asked my previous dr if there is a way we could guestimate a birth-size, and he told her no....which is funny that he said no, since i see alot of ladies on here who's dr can do a guestimate of size :(i have no idea how far i'm sizing versus alex, i just know that in june, he was 16 inches long, which was pretty much how we figure i won't make it to the oct 25 due date, or that i'm going to have a huge baby, since at that appt, i was only 20 weeks.....i have a specialized ultrasound scheduled for thursday, so we can see what is up with the due dates, and alex's size...here's what scares me...she never told me that there could be something wrong with him(as she's noticed he is bigger also), but at the bottom of the paper where they put all the stuff they need checked at the outpatient place, it says "macronesia vs. wrong dates".....apparently, the baby can still have some type of issue, causing him to grow larger, and it could require a c-section(which is fine with us, as df's mom is coming in maybe, if we do a c-sect...)i've gained 28lbs. alex has been head down since before 20 weeks, so i'm def hoping he stays there!

question: has your doctors told you what they think the size of the baby will be at birth? how many of your babies are head down? how much weight have you guys gained?doctors say Aiden will be about 7 to 7 1/2lbs at birth and he is head down...haven't really gained much weight since the 28 week...i guess my weight will start to slow down now lol...i have gained 35lbs so im kind of thankful
title: how is everyone
